alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Marion; Monongalia; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston; Western Tucker; Wetzel (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 03 at 12:33PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A LINE OF GUSTY SHOWERS WILL AFFECT SOUTHEASTERN WASHINGTON... INDIANA...WESTMORELAND...EASTERN GREENE...FAYETTE...MONONGALIA... SOUTHEASTERN WETZEL...TUCKER...PRESTON AND MARION COUNTIES THROUGH 130 PM EST... At 1231 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from 10 miles north of Indiana to Youngwood to near Mannington. Movement was east at 40 mph. Wind gusts up to 50 mph are possible with these showers. These gusts will last for less than an hour, and will be followed by gusts of 25 to 35 MPH into the afternoon. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morgantown, Greensburg, Fairmont, Indiana, Uniontown, Jeannette, Latrobe, Connellsville, Westover, Kingwood, Mannington, and Star City. This includes the following highways... Interstate 68 in West Virginia between mile markers 1 and 31. Interstate 70 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 44 and 57. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 70 and 99. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 10. Interstate 79 in West Virginia between mile markers 131 and 160. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Use extra caution if traveling, especially in high-profile vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Marion; Monongalia; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston; Western Tucker; Wetzel
